reasoning.correctness: Gold Answer lists four key symptoms: dry cough (2 weeks, nonstop day), breathing difficulties (SOB, hard time breathing), wheezing (a lot, more frequent than bronchodilator), chest tightness (confirmed yes). Frequency: day prominent/constant, night less (every other/2 days). Generated covers cough (dry, nonstop day), breathing (SOB, hard time), wheezing (a lot), frequency diff (day persistent, night less). Misses cough duration (2 weeks), wheezing > bronchodilator detail, night specific freq. Adds triggers (cold/pollen) as breathing exacerbants (accurate but not core symptoms). Critically, omits chest tightness from symptoms and incorrectly states patient 'did not explicitly confirm' it, contradicting transcript P-20 ('Yes') and Gold. Some factual errors (chest denial) but core symptoms and freq correct.

Missed: cough duration, wheezing freq detail, chest entirely, night exact freq. Covers ~70% of key points.

summary: Generated Answer is mostly accurate and relevant but incomplete (misses chest tightness and details) with a factual error denying chest confirmation.
